scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const files=['favicon.ico','favicon-32.png','favicon-48.png','favicon-96.png','apple-touch-icon.png','orcyt-logo.png','style.css']; for (const f of files) fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src',f), path.join('dist',f)); fs.mkdirSync(path.join('dist','data'), {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src','data','serie_diaria.json'), path.join('dist','data','serie_diaria.json'));"
